data.name: Para-Lax
data.detailed_description:
You wake up in a strange world and remember nothing but your name: Lax...
A farmer asks you for help. His dirt has been stolen by ogres! Get it back!
Travel through a world filled with traps and hordes of enemies.
Use your sword to fight back the goblins.



Your ultimate goal is, of course, to bring back all of the farmers dirt that the ogres have stolen.
In the game, you can defeat opponents and overcome obstacles through simple game controls. The game convinces with its two-dimensional pixel artstyle.
The whole game was created by a game developer and an art designer. This makes the whole game look very indie like and has a nice retro touch.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Para-Lax is a 2D platformer in which you play as a hero named Lax and help a farmer get back his stolen dirt! Wander through a beautiful Pixel-World, avoid the traps and kill as much goblins as you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Processor
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
